citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:46 am on
30-MAY-19.
Arrived at the facility the front gate was closed and locked. Attempted to contact by phone licensee and left a
message. Left business card on front gate. Departed facility at 12:25 pm.
